--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I may be absent for the next several days.  I caught a cold from a 
friend, 
> not surprising since everytime he laughed he started horribly 
coughing, and 
> so I'm feeling under the weather.  So, if I'm absent over the next 
several 
> days, which I hope I'm not, it's because I'm coughing and/or puking 
my guts 
> up.)
>
